compatibility.notes: The OpenSSL-standalone license is permissive and allows for integration with other permissive licenses. However, care must be taken when combining with copyleft licenses, as they may impose additional restrictions.

key_requirements: Include the copyright notice and disclaimer in all redistributions.
Obtain permission for trademark use and naming conventions.
license.name: OpenSSL-standalone
obligations: Retain copyright notice and disclaimer in redistributions of source code.
Reproduce copyright notice and disclaimer in redistributions of binary form.
Include acknowledgment in advertising materials mentioning features or use of the software.
Do not use the names 'OpenSSL Toolkit' and 'OpenSSL Project' for endorsement without permission.
Do not use 'OpenSSL' in product names without permission.
Retain acknowledgment in all forms of redistribution.
